name: 7. Quartz Future
description: Futuristic dark theme with Outfit and Manrope fonts
instructions: Create a futuristic, sci-fi inspired aesthetic with Outfit headings and Manrope body text. Use violet (#7C4DFF) for primary accents and cyan (#26C6DA) for highlights. Perfect for innovation and future-focused content.

image_style.prompt: Create futuristic, sci-fi inspired images with sleek geometric shapes and tech aesthetics. Use violet (#7C4DFF) and cyan (#26C6DA) accents on deep dark backgrounds (#101014). Style should feel innovative, cutting-edge, and forward-thinking.
